metadata.title: Zodiac Sign Collection - Scented Soy Candle - Customized Birthday Gift by Chandler Studio (Sagittarius, Peppermint & Eucalyptus)
features: UNIQUE GIFT: Simply, choose the zodiac sign and the scent and let us know your loved one’s name. We will stamp the name with silver foil onto the cap and send your personalized candle within 2 business days.
Perfect year-round refreshment scent with sweet peppermint and tingly eucalyptus with hints of earthy cedarwood. It will bring an upscale feel to any space.
This hand-blended fragrance is infused with natural essential oils, including eucalyptus oil, cornmint oil, cedarwood oil, and patchouli oil.

MADE IN THE US - ECO FRIENDLY - NATURAL: Chandler candles are hand-blended / poured in small batches with natural ingredients such as domestically grown soy wax, cotton wick, and fragrance/essential oils. The candle burns up to 50 hours depending on the room’s air current and usage.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: Everyone one of our candles is inspected to maintain the best quality. We love our candles and believe that you will love them too. For any reason, if you are not satisfied, feel free to reach out to us for a full refund.
description: Chandler zodiac candles with silver foil printed customizable caps are the perfect go-to when you have a hard time choosing the right gift for your loved ones. Every one of our candles is made with natural soy wax and fragrances free from chemicals. Our candles have a simple design, a minimal carbon footprint, and are designed to fill any room with its scent.
